name: test-helper-monorepo
author: Jordan Oliveira
description: Assistente de testes com captura de tela, OCR e integração com IA

scripts.build: npm run build:icons && npm run build:main && npm run build:renderer
scripts.dist: npm run build && set CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false&& electron-builder
scripts.dist:dir: npm run build && set CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false&& electron-builder --dir
scripts.dist:portable: npm run build && set CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false&& electron-builder --win portable
